abstract: John Derian, designer and owner of Aladdin's Cave stores in Manhattan, visits his Massachusetts hometown of Watertown for walk down memory lane.
lead_paragraph: The prodigal son’s return to Massachusetts conjures memories of the melancholic beauty that inspired the designer and shopkeeper as a child, and which informs his aesthetic to this day.

headline.main: John Derian Goes Home to Watertown

snippet: The prodigal son’s return to Massachusetts conjures memories of the melancholic beauty that inspired the designer and shopkeeper as a child, and which informs his aesthetic to this day.
